nodes.text: Rosario Dawson is an actress who portrays Ahsoka Tano in the Disney+ live-action TV series The Mandalorian. She will reprise the role for the spin-off show Star Wars: Ahsoka.

Dawson attended Lee Strasberg Theatre and Film Institute with future Anakin Skywalker actor Hayden Christensen, and later co-starred with him in the film Shattered Glass. She was cast as Ahsoka Tano in part due to a popular tweet that suggested her for the part.
